mapper.update: UPDATE rm_user_relation r JOIN ( SELECT u.user_id, COUNT(d.user_id) AS invite_count FROM rm_user u LEFT JOIN rm_user d ON d.invite_user_id = u.user_id GROUP BY u.user_id ) AS t ON r.parent_id = t.user_id CROSS JOIN rm_xt_config c SET r.supplier_level = CASE WHEN t.invite_count >= c.senior_senior THEN 3 WHEN t.invite_count >= c.intermediate_service THEN 2 WHEN t.invite_count >= c.primary_service THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHERE r.relation_level = 1 AND c.id = 1;

UPDATE rm_user_relation r JOIN rm_user parent ON r.parent_id = parent.user_id JOIN ( SELECT u.user_id, COUNT(d.user_id) AS invite_count FROM rm_user u LEFT JOIN rm_user d ON d.invite_user_id = u.user_id GROUP BY u.user_id ) AS t ON parent.user_id = t.user_id CROSS JOIN rm_xt_config c SET r.supplier_level = CASE WHEN t.invite_count >= c.senior_senior THEN 3 WHEN t.invite_count >= c.intermediate_service THEN 2 WHEN t.invite_count >= c.primary_service THEN 1 ELSE 0 END WHERE r.relation_level = 2 AND c.id = 1;
